text: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

text: The Buddha's Law is simple: Eat your rice, drink your tea, wear your clothes.
author: Eiji Yoshikawa

text: When you have excluded the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must the truth.
author: Sherlock Holmes

text: If you are depressed you are living in the past. If you are anxious you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present.
author: Lao Tzu
